title.narrative: Education Quality Improvement Programme in Tanzania

description.narrative: DFID is seeking a service provider to act as Managing Agent (MA) for the implementation of the Education Quality Improvement Programme in Tanzania (EQUIP-T) over the next four years and provide associated administrative services for the benefit of the Government of Tanzania. Cambridge Education will be lead, IRC will be subbing.

mailing-address.narrative: 3 Bloomsbury Place, London, WC1A 2QL United Kingdom
